items.content_html: An efficient URL shortener built with Node.js and MongoDB, allowing users to generate short links from long URLs. Features include click analytics to track link usage. Designed for developers seeking a lightweight and customizable solution for sharing links!

Features include click analytics to track link usage. Designed for developers seeking a lightweight and customizable solution for sharing links!
